items.title: On Immigration, Let’s Just Follow the Constitution
items.description: Both sides’ tactics and threats on immigration are hurting America’s constitutional balance.

items.title: Celebrating the Historically Low Murder Rate
items.description: Not only did 2025 see the largest single-year reduction in homicide on record, but the level may now be as low as it has been since 1900.

items.title: How the U.S. Navy Can Right the Ship
items.description: The Navy is losing a war of attrition — against its own bureaucracy.
